perturbation.original_text: The Principal appoints the Distributor as a non-exclusive distributor, to sell Principal’s qPCR infectious disease kits, Logix Smart COVID-19 PCR diagnostic test and Co-Dx Box™ instrument (the “Products”). The Products are described on Exhibit A to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The Principal appoints the Distributor as a non-exclusive distributor, to sell Principal’s qPCR infectious disease kits, Logix Smart COVID-19 PCR diagnostic test and Co-Dx Box™ instrument (the “Products”). The Products are described in Exhibit B to this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: This creates ambiguity because Exhibit A defines the Products, while this modification refers to Exhibit B. If Exhibit B does not exist or lists different products, it creates a contradiction about which products the distributor is authorized to sell.

perturbation.original_text: The Principal grants Distributor non- exclusive rights to sell these products within the countries of Romania (the “Territory”), which may be amended by mutual written agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The Principal grants Distributor exclusive rights to sell these products within the countries of Romania (the “Territory”), which may be amended by mutual written agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'non-exclusive' is changed to 'exclusive'. This creates a contradiction because the agreement now simultaneously states that the distributor has both exclusive and non-exclusive rights, directly conflicting the scope of the distributor's rights.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement shall be in effect until March 18. 2021, unless sooner terminated by either party upon (30) days written notice, without cause.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement shall be in effect until March 18. 2021, unless sooner terminated by either party upon (60) days written notice, without cause.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the termination clause. Originally, the agreement could be terminated with 30 days' notice. Now, it requires 60 days, leading to confusion about the correct notice period.
